title: Autobahn
overview: Six lanes between Oberhausen and Berlin: The Federal Highway 2 is one of the most important traffic arteries in Germany. The 473-kilometer route connects major industrial sites in the Ruhr area and the Benelux countries with Eastern Europe - and DMAX shows the people who live and work on the busy expressway. From the highway police to truck drivers in huge trucks to the asphalt columns paving the way on the track: The series tells exciting stories from international long-distance traffic.
